DOC.brief_title: Dose Hepatitis B Vaccines Non/Low-response Populations
DOC.detailed_description: A randomized clinical study conduct evaluate effect different dos hepatitis B vaccine low non-response population China . 650 low non-response subject hepatitis B vaccination enrol premise inform consent . 200 subject age 1-17 year divide 3 group 450 subject age 18-65years divide 4 group . Group 1/2/3 receive 3 dos vaccine day 0,30 180 , 5ug/10ug/20ug HBs-Ag respectively . Group 4 receive 1 dose vaccine 60ug HBs-Ag , low nonresponse subject receive second dose interval least 28 day . All vaccination do specific study personnel , take part assessment safety immunogenicity . Adverse event record vaccination blood sample collect day 30 vaccination antibody detection . The clinical program approve ethic committee perform researcher independently . Inspectors designate sponsor take meticulous on-site audit ensure safety specification whole process research .
